mapper.insert: insert into log_info (log_name, user_name, role_name, url, ip, function_name, in_param, out_param) values (#{logName}, #{username}, #{roleName}, #{url}, #{ip}, #{functionName}, #{inParam}, #{outParam})
mapper.select: select * from log_info where concat(ifnull(log_name, ''), ifnull(user_name, ''), ifnull(url, '')) like concat('%', ifnull(#{logName}, ''), '%', ifnull(#{username}, ''), '%', ifnull(#{url}, ''), '%')
select * from log_info where concat(ifnull(user_name, ''), ifnull(url, '')) like concat('%', ifnull(#{username}, ''), '%', ifnull(#{url}, ''), '%') and log_name = #{"登录日志"}
select * from log_info where concat(ifnull(user_name, ''), ifnull(url, '')) like concat('%', ifnull(#{username}, ''), '%', ifnull(#{url}, ''), '%') and log_name = #{"异常日志"}
